body_html:
Hi, I can describe you my specific use case. It's about the online service https://cloud.sagemath.com where you're essentially running programs in a managed linux environment. When this tensorboard is being started, you cannot access it directly, but through a http proxy. I.e. in the anaconda environment, where tensorflow is being installed,

$ tensorboard --port=7878 --logdir=.
Starting TensorBoard b'16' on port 7878
(You can navigate to http://0.0.0.0:7878)

Then I go to https://cloud.sagemath.com/xxxx-xxxx-project-uuid-xxx-xxx/port/7878/ which causes requests to be mapped to the service running in the project on port 7878.

and the page shows this:

Error response

Error code: 404

Message: Not Found.

Error code explanation: 404 - Nothing matches the given URI.

and in the terminal is that:

WARNING:tensorflow:IOError [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/projects/anaconda3/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/tensorboard/xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx/port/7878' on path /projects/anaconda3/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/tensorboard/xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx/port/7878
10.244.5.3 - - [02/Jun/2016 15:23:11] code 404, message Not Found
10.244.5.3 - - [02/Jun/2016 15:23:11] "GET /xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx/port/7878/ HTTP/1.1" 404 -

body:
Hi, I can describe you my specific use case. It's about the online service https://cloud.sagemath.com where you're essentially running programs in a managed linux environment. When this tensorboard is being started, you cannot access it directly, but through a http proxy. I.e. in the anaconda environment, where tensorflow is being installed,

```
$ tensorboard --port=7878 --logdir=.
Starting TensorBoard b'16' on port 7878
(You can navigate to http://0.0.0.0:7878)
```

Then I go to https://cloud.sagemath.com/xxxx-xxxx-project-uuid-xxx-xxx/port/7878/ which causes requests to be mapped to the service running in the project on port 7878.

and the page shows this:

```
Error response

Error code: 404

Message: Not Found.

Error code explanation: 404 - Nothing matches the given URI.
```

and in the terminal is that:

```
WARNING:tensorflow:IOError [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/projects/anaconda3/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/tensorboard/xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx/port/7878' on path /projects/anaconda3/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/tensorboard/xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx/port/7878
10.244.5.3 - - [02/Jun/2016 15:23:11] code 404, message Not Found
10.244.5.3 - - [02/Jun/2016 15:23:11] "GET /xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx/port/7878/ HTTP/1.1" 404 -
```
